A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie ever. When i left the theater opening night\, i wasnt sure how i felt. It wasnt good and it wasnt bad. After i watched it a second time\, i tried to like it\, and give it another chance. After letting it marinate after two showings\, i absolutely hated the film. Nothing was satisfying. The Last Jedi has made truly appreciate the prequels alot more\, and its the FIRST STAR WARS BLURAY i havent pre-ordered\, and i dont plan on adding it to my bluray collection. Its the 1 star wars movie that needs be deleted from the saga. I have great faith JJ Abrams will save us with Ep 09. Hopefully people will learn from the Last Jedi\, and move forward!
